User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Educational Resources - Welcome crawlers
Allow: /lessons/
Allow: /handouts/
Allow: /activities/
Allow: /unit-plans/
Allow: /guided-inquiry-unit/
Allow: /y8-systems/
Allow: /project/

# Restrict sensitive areas
Disallow: /my-kete.html
Disallow: /my-submissions.html
Disallow: /student-dashboard.html
Disallow: /teacher-dashboard.html
Disallow: /login.html
Disallow: /register.html
Disallow: /reset-password.html

# Restrict development and backup files
Disallow: /js/
Disallow: /css/
Disallow: /*.json
Disallow: /*.py
Disallow: /*.sql
Disallow: /*.md
Disallow: /netlify/
Disallow: /supabase/
Disallow: /public_backup*/

# Block AI training crawlers (Optional - preserves educational content integrity)
User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Disallow: /

User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: Claude-Web
Disallow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://tekete.netlify.app/sitemap.xml
